badge.name: Attorney's Badge
badge.description: Without this no one would belive I'm a lawyer.

charm.name: Blue Badger's Charm
charm.description: A small charm of the Blue Badger's head.

Demo_Main_01.text: {blip:2}Testing, testing...{p:500} One, two, three...{p:500} Is this thing on?

Demo_Main_01.name: Oldbag
Demo_Main_01.text: {addEvidence:badge}{blip:1}{flash}{showCharacter}{sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}Welcome to the Ace Attorney Engine demo!

Demo_Main_01.name: Oldbag
Demo_Main_01.text: In this demo, I'll be showing you some of the features of the Ace Attorney Engine.

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}We can change text colors like {color:red}red{color:white}, {color:lime}green{color:white}, or {color:lightblue}blue{color:white}.

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]}We can also add pauses... {p:500} for dramatic effect.

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}And we can trigger animations! {sprite:Oldbag["Shocked"]}{flash} WHAM! {p:1000}{sprite:Oldbag["Smirking"]} Did you see that?

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: You can also add evidence to your inventory during dialogue.
{addEvidence:charm,true}{color:lightblue}{blip:4}Blue Badger's Charm added to the court record.{color:white}{p:1000}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {textSpeed:20}{sprite:Oldbag["Angry"]}Are you even listening to me? Today's youth doesn't care about anything.{skip:0}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {textSpeed:20}You only want the instant gratification, without patience and perseverance.{skip:0}

Demo_showcase.name: Oldbag
Demo_showcase.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}...{p:100}Anyway, let's move on to the next part of the demo.

Demo_Main_2.name: Oldbag
Demo_Main_2.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Normal"]}This is the second section! We jumped here.

Section_FirstMeeting.name: Oldbag
Section_FirstMeeting.text: {sprite:Oldbag["Embarrassed"]}Nice to meet you for the first time!{setState:hasMetOldbag,true}
